Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Prohibits the sale of certain medical solution containers
Summary: Prohibits the sale of certain intravenous containers.
LawCode: Add Art 37 Title 8 §§37-0801 - 37-0805, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of intravenous solution containers made with intentionally added DEHP
